text: action Behaviour take environment clean. Possible values "error", "warn", "message" ignore Character vector containing names variables trigger action. NULL, variables start dot ignored envir Environment checked

Check if list of loaded packages is clean — check_packages
text: action Behaviour take environment clean. Possible values "error", "warn", "message" ignore Character vector containing names non-base packages trigger action. NULL, base packages permitted

title: Check if list of loaded packages is clean — check_packages
text: Invisibly returns logical vector names corresponding loaded namespaces. Values TRUE package ignored, FALSE
